snippet.title: Guy unveils ripped new physique
snippet.content:
HE was recently referred to as a "fat Asian" by shock jock Kyle Sandilands but Adelaide's Guy Sebastian is now anything but. The chart-topping Aussie singer has ditched the "dad bod" and showcased his ripped new physique in a . Guy toned up his body in just eight weeks, thanks to a new fitness regime called DARC - Dynamic Aerobic Resistance Conditioning. Guy, 35, resolved to get serious about his fitness after letting himself go in the years following the birth of his two sons, Hudson, 5, and Archer, 3, with wife Jules.
"I was in an unhealthy cycle. I was drinking too much. I wasn't eating well. And everything I thought I was doing right wasn't working," he tells the magazine which is released today. Guy also managed to complete his transformation while recording his ninth album, Conscious.
